description: Complete system overview focusing on the Spades game engine architecture, core components, and their interactions. Includes high-level documentation of game flow and state management.
Detailed documentation of the game state data models, including player positions, team assignments, bidding system, trick tracking, and scoring mechanisms as defined in types.ts
Comprehensive documentation of deck management algorithms, including card distribution, hand sorting logic, suit/high card counting, and specialized spade tracking implementations
Documentation of data flow between game engine components, including state transitions between game phases, bidding process, trick-taking mechanics, and scoring calculations
Technical specification of the card rendering system, including pip positioning algorithms, face card layouts, and suit-specific styling implementation details
